message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Time is running out, Alice.  This is a fair deal, take it before inflation eats away at it!
I'm not budging much, Bob. Inflation hurts me less than you.
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the only fair outcome. Take it before we both lose!
